line.originaltext: 1/4 cup butter
1/2 bunch green onions, chopped
1/2 cup butter
2 pounds frozen crawfish, cleaned
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of potato soup
line.annotation: create_ing(ing87, "2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of potato soup")

line.originaltext: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
line.annotation: create_ing(ing88, "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup")

line.originaltext: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing89, "1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained")

line.originaltext: 4 ounces cream cheese, softened
2 cups half-and-half cream
1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
Melt 1/4 cup of butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Melt 1/4 cup of butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Melt 1/4 cup of butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Saute green onions in butter until tender.
Remove from pan, and set aside.
In the same skillet, melt 1/2 cup of butter, and saute the crawfish for 5 minutes; set aside.
In the same skillet, melt 1/2 cup of butter, and saute the crawfish for 5 minutes; set aside.
In a large pot over medium heat, combine potato soup, mushroom soup, corn, and cream cheese.
In a large pot over medium heat, combine potato soup, mushroom soup, corn, and cream cheese.
In a large pot over medium heat, combine potato soup, mushroom soup, corn, and cream cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing87, ing88, ing89, ing90}, ing97, "cheesy soup", "in the pot")

line.originaltext: Mix well, and bring to a slow boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing97, t17, ing98, "hot soup stuff", "slowly boil")

line.originaltext: Stir in half-and-half, sauteed green onions, and crawfish.
line.annotation: combine({ing91, ing94, ing96, ing98}, ing99, "soupiness", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Season with cayenne pepper.
Bring to a low boil, and simmer 5 minutes to blend flavors.
line.annotation: cook(ing100, t17, ing101, "chowder", "low boil, simmer 5 minutes")
